generated.title: GeneratedMeanLinearRange
generated.description: This is an autogenerated partial class definition of 'MeanLinearRange'

description*.en: "Mean Linear Range" is, in a given material, for specified charged particles of a specified energy, the average displacement of the particles before they stop. That is, the mean totl rectified path length travelled by a particle in the course of slowing down to rest (or to some suitable cut-off energy) in a given substance under specified conditions averaged over a group of particles having the same initial energy.

title: MeanLinearRange
